name: nonhomogeneous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
consisting of parts or people who are different from each other: The poetry collection is uneven as it is nonhomogeneous in terms of format and style. What is the best way to teach non-homogeneous groups of adult students in introductory English classes?
More examplesFewer examplesBecause the data was non-homogeneous, it caused numerous problems when it came to analysing it and drawing conclusions.Vegetable soup is a good example of a nonhomogeneous mixture because its composition is not uniform.They invesigated the stress patterns in nonhomogeneous materials of different types.There was a nonhomogeneous distribution of cracks throughout the structure.
